pages.text: These $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Linking-Pedestals%2C-and-Advanced-Uses)Augments/$ only effect the rate at which a pedestal SENDS items, so there is no need to upgrade both a sender and receiver unless the receiver sends its items to a chained receiver. $(li)5 Upgrades can be used on a pedestal as a time.

pages.title: Pedestal Speed
pages.text: $(#FF0000)Pedestal Speed Augment$()$(li)The Speed Upgrade decreases the delay when sending items from 20ticks(default), 10t, 5t, 3t, 2t, 1t.

pages.title: Pedestal Capacity
pages.text: $(#FF0000)Pedestal Transfer Capacity Augment$() $(li)The Capacity Upgrade Increases the amount of items sent per interval, from 4items(default), 8i, 16i, 32i, 48i, 64i.
